General.Name: Adux SA
General.Description: AdUX SA provides advertising services in France, Belgium, Italy, Spain, Germany, the Netherlands, and internationally. It provides non-intrusive advertising, in-content advertising, brand content, and geomarketing services. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Paris, France.

5.Name: Mr. Carlo  Poss
5.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of Adux Italy
